EDUCATION.Institute Name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science,goa campus

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Reliability-Performance Tradeoff Analysis in MapReduce Cluster
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
•	The aim was to determine the replication factor of MapReduce jobs, which minimizes completion time without significantly affecting the system reliability.
•	Developed a parser for Hadoop logs to organize the data into tables. An analyzer was implemented to calculate various metrics and then correlate the job parameters with metric calculated to get reliability-performance tradeoff.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Hadoop Job Types Energy Consumption Analysis
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
•	The aim of the project was to prove the hypothesis that the power consumed by a Hadoop MapReduce cluster for various job types can be optimized by using different CPU frequencies.
•	The data collection for the project was automated using bash scripts to collect data for different job types running on a 10 Node Hadoop cluster with varying CPU frequencies.
•	A clustering algorithm was developed to determine the job type from various parameters and model to correlate job types with optimum CPU frequency.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Movie Suggestion based on Association Analysis
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Implemented the modified Apriori Algorithm on an Apache Hadoop Multinode Cluster setup. The application will suggest movies a user is most likely to enjoy based on the previous movies the user has watched and rated.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Application of Machine Learning in Biology
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Developed a model using Support Vector Machines for Identification of Mannose Interacting Residues using Local Composition

Developed a Auto-download client for Moodle Server ( Course Management System). Also intergrated the client with windows notification system , to notify
the user when a new file is uploaded to Moodle
